text: Gianfranco "Franco" Lombardi (20 March 1941 â€“ 22 January 2021) was an Italian professional basketball player and coach. During his playing career, his nickname was "Dado".Gianfranco Lombardi Nickname(s): Dado, Franco. He was born in Livorno, Italy. He played for the national team. He participated in the 1960, 1964 and 1968 Summer Olympics. In 2006, he was honored into the Italian Basketball Hall of Fame. Lombardi died on 22 January 2021 in Cocquio- Trevisago, Varese, Italy at the age of 79.Basket, morto Dado Lombardi: aveva 79 anni ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian basketball players Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Livorno
title: Gianfranco Lombardi
